snippet: The inventor of the water purifier, Dean Kamen, thinks his device can bring fresh water to the world.
abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews Paul Lazarus documentary film SlingShot.
lead_paragraph: The inventor of the water purifier, Dean Kamen, thinks his device can bring fresh water to the world.

headline.main: Review: ‘SlingShot’ Documentary Pitches Solution to Global Water Crisis
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘SlingShot’ Documentary Pitches Solution to Global Water Crisis
